meta-review.comment: Horizon Forbidden West Complete Edition is a visually stunning adventure that shines on PC, offering exceptional performance and optimization. The game takes you on a captivating journey through a beautifully realized world, allowing players to experience Aloy's second adventure with maximum detail and flexibility. While some critics noted minor drawbacks, the overall consensus is overwhelmingly positive, making this a must-play game for all. Get ready to be engrossed in a breathtaking narrative, engaging combat, and a soundtrack worthy of a top-notch film production.
